price: Mu by’ukuri we (Allah) azi ibyo muvuga mwerura, ndetse azi n’ibyo muhisha.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra mina al-qawli wayaʿlamu mā taktumūna
